F?il leader Micheál Martin has said Enda Kenny 's stance on a three-way debate next week is`` a bit farcical''. Mr Micheál Martin said he is willing to participate in different types of debates, but said: It is wrong for one party to try and contrive with any particular station on the format. The Labour leader Eamon Gilmore is renewing his call on Mr Enda Kenny to take part in Tuesday's TV3 debate.
